alternateName: World's most popular songs on Spotify, updated daily

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Top Spotify Songs in 73 Countries (Daily Updated) dataset

distribution.name: universal_top_spotify_songs.csv
distribution.description: This dataset contains the Daily top 50 songs on Spotify. The data is updated daily and includes various features such as song duration, artist details, album information, and song popularity.

field.name: spotify_id
field.description: The unique identifier for the song in the Spotify database. (type: str)

field.name: name
field.description: The title of the song. (type: str)

field.name: artists
field.description: The name(s) of the artist(s) associated with the song. Do split(', ') to convert to a list (type: str)

field.name: daily_rank
field.description: The daily rank of the song in the top 50 list. (type: int)

field.name: daily_movement
field.description: The change in rankings compared to the previous day. (type: int)

field.name: weekly_movement
field.description: The change in rankings compared to the previous week. (type: int)

field.name: country
field.description: The ISO code of the country of the Top 50 Playlist. If Null, then the playlist if 'Global Top 50'. (type: str)

field.name: snapshot_date
field.description: The date on which the data was collected from the Spotify API. (type: str)

field.name: popularity
field.description: A measure of the song's current popularity on Spotify. (type: int)

field.name: is_explicit
field.description: Indicates whether the song contains explicit lyrics. (type: bool)

field.name: duration_ms
field.description: The duration of the song in milliseconds. (type: int)

field.name: album_name
field.description: The title of the album the song belongs to. (type: str)

field.name: album_release_date
field.description: The release date of the album the song belongs to. (type: str)

field.name: danceability
field.description: A measure of how suitable the song is for dancing based on various musical elements. (type: float)

field.name: energy
field.description: A measure of the intensity and activity level of the song. (type: float)

field.name: key
field.description: The key of the song. (type: int)

field.name: loudness
field.description: The overall loudness of the song in decibels. (type: float)

field.name: mode
field.description: Indicates whether the song is in a major or minor key. (type: int)

field.name: speechiness
field.description: A measure of the presence of spoken words in the song. (type: float)

field.name: acousticness
field.description: A measure of the acoustic quality of the song. (type: float)

field.name: instrumentalness
field.description: A measure of the likelihood that the song does not contain vocals. (type: float)

field.name: liveness
field.description: A measure of the presence of a live audience in the recording. (type: float)

field.name: valence
field.description: A measure of the musical positiveness conveyed by the song. (type: float)

field.name: tempo
field.description: The tempo of the song in beats per minute. (type: float)

field.name: time_signature
field.description: The estimated overall time signature of the song. (type: int)

recordSet.name: universal_top_spotify_songs.csv
recordSet.description: This dataset contains the Daily top 50 songs on Spotify. The data is updated daily and includes various features such as song duration, artist details, album information, and song popularity.

name: Top Spotify Songs in 73 Countries (Daily Updated)
description:
This dataset presents the top songs currently trending for over 70 countries. 

Top 50 songs for each country is **updated daily** to provide the most up-to-date information on the popularity of songs in the world.

> If you find this dataset helpful, don't forget to leave a upvote ❤️🎧

## Interesting Task Ideas:

1. Identify the most popular genres of music in different countries over time.
2. Analyze the change in rankings of songs over time to identify trends and patterns.
3. Investigate whether there is a correlation between song popularity and its danceability or energy level.
4. Explore the relationship between the explicitness of songs and their popularity.
5. Analyze the relationship between song features (such as acousticness or instrumentalness) and their popularity.
6. Predict the future popularity of songs based on historical data and machine learning algorithms.
7. Compare the top songs in different countries to identify cultural music preferences.

## NOTES

- Data may be missing / incomplete from 2024-11-27 to 2024-12-09 due to [Spotify API changes](https://www.kaggle.com/discussions/general/550242).
